name: Nuclear Day Survival
description:
A captivating survival game with a unique atmosphere. Survive in a city that was hit by a nuclear attack.

Can you survive in a world where there was a nuclear explosion? Radiation, hunger, disease and suffering are all around you. Your goal is to escape from the dying city and find the love of your youth. Unique atmosphere and piercing to the depths of the story. Reveal the mystery of the missing documents and make a choice: save the people around you or leave them to perish..

What awaits you in the game:

- Hard survival. You will be haunted by the typical problems of a survivor, such as hunger, disease, thirst, a gradually coming nuclear winter and bandits.

- Unique story. Along the way, you will find many stories of different people, exciting puzzle quests and the right to choose during the passage of quests.

- Dynamic game world. In the game world, weather conditions will change, the balance of power of groups of people outside, and so on.

Explore abandoned and ruined.

Peculiarities:
- Crafting system
- Unique storyline
- Exploring an interesting world

Now - Demo Version.
